price: Allah’a yalan uyduran, yahut ayetlerini yalanlayanlardan daha zalim kim olabilir? Zalimler kesinlikle kurtuluşa eremezler.
arabic: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوۡ كَذَّبَ بِـَٔايَٰتِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waman aẓlamu mimmani if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban aw kadhaba biāyātihi innahu lā yuf'liḥu al-ẓālimūna
